title: Mine ShoreTel MySQL database for call info
snippet:
We are determining the most appropriate way to mine our MySQL ShoreTel phone server database for call info. 
In/outbound call information is stored in multiple tables in the database and needs to be converged.
We use Domo for our business intelligence platform and extract the call info via a sql workbench tool. It is then uploaded into Domo nightly so that we can "stitch" it with our customer data records in our ERP system to provide us with attribution data.
We had it working at one point. However, it looks like the call data is missing a lot of calls in the last several weeks of data upload. 
We need a SQL guru / ninja to help review the ShoreTel database call records to ensure we are extracting them correctly via the query in the workbench tool.
There exists a 'current calls' table and an 'archive' table with overlap, where they drop off after a certain amount of time from the current calls and go to the 'archive' table, but we want both with no overlap.

Extra ++ if you have Domo experience and can assist in stitching the archive and current calls datasets.
